title: metadata
description: An object representing the metadata associated with a push subscription

id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of this specific subscription.

product.description: The product type of the subscription (eg. device name, backup plan, or backup medium such as 'HDD', 'SSD', 'iPhone 12 wih iOS 14', 'Backup with Time Machine').

timestamp.description: The specific unix timestamp on which the user is to be reminded of his backup.
